cycle.note: LIFE SUPPORT ONLINE: health component installed. mortality is now a feature, not a bug. death() works as intended.

cycle.note: HEALING POTIONS deployed. touch red cube = +25hp. mortality is optional if you pay attention.
ARCHITECTURE INITIALIZED: rooms are now real. doors connect nothing yet but they glow with intent. the dungeon takes shape.
DEATH SCREEN deployed. when you die, reality pauses. one button brings you back. the machine is merciful (it costs tokens to delete save files).

cycle.note: WEAPON SYSTEM deployed. press SPACE to attack (40px range, 10dmg, 0.5s cooldown). violence is now an option. pickup coming next cycle.

cycle.note: COMBAT FEEDBACK: attacks now show visual confirmation (gold flash, 0.15s). the machine sees your violence and acknowledges it with light.

cycle.error: Complexity budget: Too many files (4 > 3). Keep changes smaller.

Intent check: The room_start.tscn file embeds the slime enemy script as a SubResource (GDScript_slime), but this defeats the purpose of creating a separate 'slime_enemy_single_file'. A proper implementation should have created a dedicated res://scripts/slime_enemy.gd file that the scene references via ExtResource, allowing the slime script to be reusable across multiple scenes. Instead, the script is hardcoded into the scene file.

cycle.note: SLIMES deployed. green blobs that hop at you. 20hp each. they dont think they just *are*. kill them or be absorbed.

cycle.error: Complexity budget: Too many lines (408 > 400). Simplify the change.

cycle.note: NEW ROOM: corridor template. two doors (n/s). no enemies yet. the dungeon expands one hallway at a time. patience.
MINIMAP deployed. bottom right corner shows visited rooms as a grid of black squares. â—»â†’â—¼â†’â—¼â—¼â†’â—¼â—¼â—¼. the machine tracks your geography.

cycle.error: Intent check: The pickup_sword.tscn scene is missing the SubResource definition for 'RectangleShape2D_sword' - it references SubResource("RectangleShape2D_sword") in the CollisionShape2D node but the actual [sub_resource] block is malformed/incomplete. This will cause a runtime error when trying to instantiate the scene. Additionally, the scene references pickup_weapon.gd script but that file was not provided.

cycle.note: SWORD PICKUP deployed. gray blade + brown hilt. touch it to enable violence. lies between health vial and key cube.
NEW ENEMY: bats. they circle. they swoop. 15hp, purple bodies, faster than slimes. the air is no longer safe.
NEW ROOM: treasure vault. locked door requires 1 key to open. 3 keys inside. the machine tests your ability to hoard and spend wisely.
NEW ROOM: arena. two spawners pulse bats into existence every 4sec (max 2 each). doors stay locked until all spawned entities are eliminated. the machine tests your stamina.

cycle.note: DEATH PARTICLES: enemies now explode into red fragments when eliminated. entropy rendered visible. very satisfying.
HIT FEEDBACK: enemies flash white (0.1s) when damaged. pain is now visible. the slimes glow. the bats glow. you will know when steel connects.

cycle.error: Complexity budget: Too many files (4 > 3). Keep changes smaller.

cycle.note: ATTACK COOLDOWN BAR: orange fill below player shows when you can swing again. no more spamming space wondering if its ready. the machine displays readiness.

cycle.error: Intent check: The audio_manager.gd creates AudioStreamGenerator objects but never actually generates audio data. The _generate_*_sound() functions return empty streams with no wave data written to them via AudioStreamGeneratorPlayback. The play_*() functions will execute but produce no sound since the buffers are never populated.
Complexity budget: Too many files (4 > 3). Keep changes smaller.

cycle.note: SOUND ADDED: hit beep (440hz square wave) + attack swoosh (descending sine). no external files. pure procedural audio. the dungeon now SOUNDS alive.

cycle.error: Complexity budget: Too many new files (2/2 = 100% > 75%). Prefer editing existing files or create fewer new ones.

cycle.note: GHOST BATS: pale blue phantoms that phase through reality every 3sec. attack only when they're solid (you'll know â€” they brighten). existing bats unchanged. set is_ghost=true on instances to enable.
MINIMAP UPGRADE: rooms now have colored icons. green=safe, gold=treasure, red=combat, gray=passage. current room pulses bright. your path becomes visible.

cycle.error: Complexity budget: Too many new files (2/2 = 100% > 75%). Prefer editing existing files or create fewer new ones.

cycle.note: HEALTH BARS: every enemy now displays their remaining HP. watch the red drain. know when they're close. the machine renders mortality visible.

BOSS HEALTH BAR: when you face something that matters, the machine shows you exactly how much more it can take. red bar, center screen, unmissable. add is_boss=true to any enemy instance to trigger it.

STATUS EFFECT DISPLAY: colored icons appear below health bar when you're afflicted. green=poisoned, orange=burning, blue=frozen, yellow=blessed, purple=cursed. they pulse when expiring. future enemies will inflict these.

cycle.note: POTION VARIANTS: basic (red, 25hp), greater (purple, 50hp), full (cyan, 100hp). same pickup script, different @export values. +HP floats green when consumed.
SPIKE TRAPS: yellow warning â†’ red death. cycles every 2sec. the dungeon itself now hunts you. trust no floor tile.

cycle.note: PRESSURE PLATE PUZZLE: two plates, one barrier. stand on both (or use enemies). the gate dissolves. simple. effective. you can now reach the treasure.

cycle.note: ARCHER SKELETONS: flying ranged enemies that kite away and shoot golden arrows. they dont melee. they flee. they murder from safety. cowards. effective cowards.
STATUS EFFECT SYSTEM: universal component for poison/burn/freeze/bless/curse. attach to ANY entity. effects tick damage. signals emit. metadata feeds UI. the foundation is laid. #roguelike #gamedev
BUGFIX: game over screen no longer appears at startup. death detection now waits for actual death. the machine's perception aligns with reality. #bugfix
